body: Appearently its not allowed to spoiler the end of a movie, but its allowed to run it down mid...

replies.body:
People out there have waited for months on end in anticipation of the movie; Compare that to losing a single match in league because of a bad player. The punishment is fair. 

Common sense would dictate. The long interval worth of hype lost, weight more than losing one game. 

You're playing this game too much man, it has distorted your sense of worth.
